column4: Thailand: Preliminary reports say that a 20 -year-old Cambodian male was killed on September 24
column6: when part of an eight-storey condo construction site collapsed in Pattaya district
column8: Thailand.------It is reported that other Cambodian workers were injured
column9: including two 18-year-old males and a 19 year-old female
column10: who are now being treated in a Thai hospital.------AREY NEWS
